original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: US President Donald Trump expresses a desire to broker a peace deal between Russia and Ukraine, suggesting it could secure his place in heaven, as he continues efforts to bring warring sides to the table for direct negotiations. Meanwhile, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has approved a plan to seize Gaza City, with the Israeli military already holding its outskirts and preparing to deepen attacks on Hamas.</s>
